name: OCKStoreError
desc: The errors the store emits when there is problem during a transaction.

items.name: case fetchFailed(reason: String)
items.desc: A case that occurs when a fetch fails.

items.name: case addFailed(reason: String)
items.desc: A case that occurs when adding an entity fails.

items.name: case updateFailed(reason: String)
items.desc: A case that occurs when an update to an existing entity fails.

items.name: case deleteFailed(reason: String)
items.desc: A case that occurs when deleting an existing entity fails.

items.name: case invalidValue(reason: String)
items.desc: A case that occurs when you provide an invalid value.

items.name: case timedOut(reason: String)
items.desc: A case that occurs when an asynchronous action takes too long.

items.name: var errorDescription: String?
items.desc: A localized message that describes the error that occurred.

items.name: var failureReason: String?
items.desc: A localized message that describes the reason for the failure.

items.name: var helpAnchor: String?
items.desc: A localized message that provides “help” text if the user requests help.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: A localized message that describes the failure.

items.name: var recoverySuggestion: String?
items.desc: A localized message that describes how your app might recover from the failure.
